features: Comprehensive Face Care Set – The Face Facts Ceramide Bundle includes Eye Cream (15ml) for dark circles, Moisturising Gel Cream (50ml) for dry skin, Repairing Serum Cream (30ml) to smooth fine lines, and Hydrating Cleanser (200ml) for a refreshed face.

Targets Dark Circles & Puffiness – This eye cream for dark circles and puffy eyes contains ceramides and active ingredients designed to reduce the appearance of dark circles and puffiness, leaving your eyes looking brighter and well-rested.

Ideal for Dry & Sensitive Skin – The Face Facts Ceramide products, like the moisturiser and cleanser, are gentle and hydrating, making them perfect for dry skin while maintaining the skin’s natural moisture balance without irritation.

Suitable for All Skin Types – Whether you have oily, combination, or dry skin, this face wash for dry skin and moisturiser provide nourishing hydration that suits all skin types without being greasy or heavy.

Affordable Skin Care Set – This all-in-one Face Facts Ceramide bundle offers great value, addressing multiple skin concerns with hydrating cleanser, moisturisers, and eye cream, all designed to restore and maintain healthy, glowing skin.
description: Product description The Face Facts Ceramide Skin Care Bundle provides everything you need for a complete and effective face care routine. This set includes four essential products: the Face Facts Ceramide Eye Cream (15ml), formulated to target dark circles and puffiness around the eyes; the Ceramide Moisturising Gel Cream (50ml), designed to deeply hydrate dry skin while locking in moisture; the Ceramide Repairing Serum Cream (30ml), which restores skin elasticity and smooths fine lines; and the Ceramide Hydrating Cleanser (200ml), a gentle face cleanser that effectively removes impurities while maintaining moisture. Ideal for women with dry skin, this bundle works together to nourish and restore, leaving your skin feeling soft, refreshed, and rejuvenated. The Face Facts Ceramide range is carefully crafted to address dryness, dark circles, and puffiness, making it the perfect addition to your skin care set for all ages. Ingredients Castor Oil, Glycerin, Oats and 5 Ceramides Safety Warning For external use only. See more
